page.title: 20SHOPPING
page.content: Many people were interviewed about the shops in the area.Overall, the people said that it was very lacking in all types of shops and that it had got worse as small shops had to close down.Many people said a general store would be very useful and that the town was too small to merit a supermarket, also it would be too noisy. The shops in Pleasley at the moment are a Post Office,fish and chip shop, small grocers shops, bric a brac shop, a butchers shop, shortly to close down, and a car spares shop.The shop that the people seemed to need more was a chemists shop. People seemed to think that it was in order for the small corner store to charge more for items than the large supermarkets because they had to. Otherwise they culd not compete and would have to close down.
